/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a comprehensive view of the street below. The street is flanked by trees on both sides, their bare branches reaching out towards the overcast sky. The road itself is devoid of any vehicles or pedestrians, adding a sense of tranquility to the scene. In the distance, a few buildings can be seen, their details softened by the distance. The colors in the image are muted, with the gray of the overcast sky and the green of the trees creating a harmonious palette.
